archimate:Capability.name: Natural Resources Management
archimate:Capability.documentation: Ability to identify, track, set quality standards for, equitably sustain, and distribute the supply of non-living matter derived from nature such as, but not limited to, solar energy, waves, wind, natural gas, shale, minerals, and ores such as coal and precious metals, which include uranium.

properties.value: Ability to identify, track, set quality standards for, equitably sustain, and distribute the supply of non-living matter derived from nature such as, but not limited to, solar energy, waves, wind, natural gas, shale, minerals, and ores such as coal and precious metals, which include uranium.
